waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons

Class NeuronConvolution

  • java.lang.Object
    • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons.Neuron
      • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons.NeuronConvolution

  • public class NeuronConvolution
extends Neuron
    This is the class for convolution neurons. It extends the Neuron class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double bias
      The bias value.
      private double biasDelta
      The delta value for the bias.
      private org.jblas.DoubleMatrix filter
      A DoubleMatrix containing the values for the filter.
      private org.jblas.DoubleMatrix filterDelta
      A DoubleMatrix that will store the delta values for the filter.
      private int filterSize
      The size of the receptive field.
      private int stride
      The stride used.

                            java.util.List<Neuron> upperNeurons)
        Calculates the bias delta and triggers the calculation of the filter deltas.
        Specified by:
        calculateDeltas in class Neuron
        Parameters:
        lowerNeurons - A list of neurons in the layer below.
        upperNeurons - A list of neurons in the layer above.

      • calculateFilterDeltas

        private void calculateFilterDeltas(java.util.List<Neuron> upperNeurons,
                                   org.jblas.DoubleMatrix upperError)
        Calculates the deltas for the filter.
        Parameters:
        upperNeurons - A list of neurons in the layer above.
        upperError - A DoubleMatrix containing the errors from the layer above.

      • calculateInputError

        private void calculateInputError(java.util.List<Neuron> upperNeurons,
                                 org.jblas.DoubleMatrix upperError)
        Back-propagates the error through this neuron, calculating how much each input to this neuron is responsible for this neurons error.
        Parameters:
        upperNeurons - A list of neurons in the layer above.
        upperError - A DoubleMatrix containing the errors from the layer above.

        Calculates the neurons output using the convolution process.

      • getEffectedBounds

        private int[] getEffectedBounds(int y,
                                int x)
        Calculates the coords. of the receptive field.
        Parameters:
        y - The Y coord. of the output position to calculate.
        x - The X coord. of the output position to calculate.
        Returns:
        The bounds of the receptive field in order {upper bound, left bound, Y size, X size}.

      • initFilter

        public void initFilter()
        Initialises the values for the filter. The min/max values are dictated by NetworkManager.MaximumInitialWeights and are generated used NetworkManager.random.

      • setBias

        public void setBias(double b)

        Parameters:
